name: One Of Us (GaunaZX)
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2021 Project

Guide the Artifacts to the end of the level  together

P - Pause
R - Reset Level
A-D/Arrows Keys - Move
Space Bar - Jump
Q-E - Switch Character

Mouse: Left-Click - Atract the Artifacts to the current Artifact
Right-Click - Use the current Artifact's Special Ability

Lore: Created more then 100 years ago by a mad mage, time came when in the end of his life they were stored in the deep dungeon in the for his return. When the artifacts finally realized that he would not come back, they decided to work together to free themselves. The dungeon however was made to keep them in and always targets the weakest link of the robbers - being themselves their own robbers.

Characters
A Sword, a Dagger, a Wand, a Battery and a Mug go into a bar...
